meanings: [동사] push, press, pressure, hurry (sb into doing), rush (sb into doing)
pressure sb to finish the work fast
charge for call[the demand], reminder[demanding, collection] fee

vlive.korean: 제 방송에 하트를 못 눌러요. 그래서 이렇게 독촉하는 거예요. 독촉? 독촉이... I can't click hearts to my V. That's why I'm asking you. 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : [SHAUN-TTK003] 보아BoA,빈지노
vlive.english: I can't click hearts to my V. That's why I'm asking you.
